title: From your friends and colleagues in the commercial department

content.name: Mihaela
content.message: May the Honey jar always remain filled with joy and happiness!

content.name: Luz
content.message: Que los vientos siempre soplen a su favor, ¡muchas felicidades!

content.name: Toby
content.message: Congratulations Carlos. May your day be filled with alcohol and laughter and your future with love and happiness!

content.name: Marshia
content.message: May the love you share today grow stronger as you grow old together, que vivan los novios!

content.name: Alan
content.message: Carlos! Wishing you y tu esposa all the happiness in el mundo! Congratulations!

content.name: Kidist A
content.message: May you have a blessed family!.. Make it work!. And keep it simple! (a piece of advice from an unmarried comrade :)

content.name: Costas
content.message: Heartfelt congratulations! Best wishes on this wonderful journey, as you build your new lives together. May you have a lifetime of love and happiness.

content.name: Lando
content.message: Muchas felicidades Carlos! Sos un grande y es un honor trabajar con vos. Espero que seas muy feliz con tu nueva familia. Pura vida!!

content.name: Joaquin
content.message: ¡¡Muchas felicidades, parejita!! Os deseo todo lo mejor y que celebréis este día tan especial con alegría. ¡Viva el amor y la madre que os parió! =D

content.name: Joanna
content.message: I hope that your marriage will last forever and that you will always be in love and extremely happy! Happy Wedding Day!

content.name: Bart
content.message: May this be a next step towards fulfilled, happy and joyful life. For both of you! ¡Felicitaciones por el gran paso!

content.name: Ilan
content.message: Carlos, congratulations for this important step in your life, God bless your new family with tons of dreams, health and happiness!

content.name: Tom
content.message: Hey Carlos! Thanks for all that you do for our company, for your leadership, for keeping cool under pressure, and for being a great friend. We are still at the start of this great adventure. Give my regards to your new boss!

content.name: Sava
content.message: Marriage is like a walk in the park… Jurassic Park.

content.name: Bethelhem T
content.message: Congratulations on your wedding!!! May your life blessed with more happiness!!!መልካም የጋብቻ ሕይወት ይሁንልህ !!!

content.name: Angela
content.message: I hope you have a happy and long marriage. Please enjoy your honeymoon without worrying about work!

content.name: Juani
content.message: Muchas felicidades en esta nueva etapa en tu vida! Te deseo lo mejor
